Building a regional air mobility ecosystem

Surf Air Mobility is an electric aviation, software, and air travel company expanding the category of regional air travel and reinventing flying through the power of electrification.

OUR BRANDS

We brought together 3 air travel brands

Our brands presently offer more short haul scheduled commuter flights than anyone else in the country, and have flown millions of passengers over millions of miles over the past decade.

Surf Air offers premium regional scheduled flight service within California.

Southern Airways Express has scheduled flights in regions across the entire U.S.

Much of Southernâs flying is for long term recurring government contracts through the Essential Air Service (EAS) program.

Mokulele Airlines is the largest inter- island commuter airline in Hawaii.

It connects the islands with reliable air travel that visitors and locals use every day.

Electrification technology

Electrifying the Cessna Grand Caravan EX

By upgrading one of the worldâs most prolific turboprop aircraft flying today with electrified propulsion, our exclusive relationship with Textron Aviation allows us to bring electric planes online at scale through their existing sales and marketing channels.

Point-to-point air travel

Flying from smaller airports can save hours compared to driving or traveling through large, crowded commercial airports.

A new network

Connecting regional airports

A new network, with new opportunities

We believe making air travel more affordable and sustainable will fundamentally change how we move around the world. As we work toward reducing the environmental cost of flying to zero, we can redraw the map of where we live, work, and explore, opening up exciting new economic and lifestyle opportunities.

Illustrative example of regional flight network potential

Be a part of bringing scheduled flights to the airport closest to your home or office.

Climate

Helping to decarbonize air travel

Passengers will no longer have to make the choice between the best travel solution and the most sustainable option once electrified aircraft take flight. With electrified aircraft flying short regional routes, we can start to make an impact on the aviation industryâs CO2 emissions.
